entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Light snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
